Row.Text: Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use Convert to City. Receive a second Merchant or Colonist each time you purchase or train one.

[BLIST][LI]Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use [B]Convert to City[/B].[LI]Receive a second [B]Merchant[/B] or [B]Colonist[/B] each time you purchase or train one.[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Byrsa[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Carthage's associated Wonder.
